Package pulse.util

Class ReflexiveFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • pulse.util.ReflexiveFinder
  • public class ReflexiveFinder
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides utility methods for finding classes and instances of Reflexive in a PULsE package.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static java.util.List<java.lang.Class<?>> classesIn​(java.lang.String pckgname)
      Uses Java Reflection API to find all classes within the package named pckgname.
      static <V extends Reflexive>
      java.util.List<V>      		 simpleInstances​(java.lang.String pckgname)  
      static <V extends Reflexive>
      java.util.List<V>      		 simpleInstances​(java.lang.String pckgname, java.lang.Object... params)
      Finds simple instances of Reflexive subclasses within pckgname.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • classesIn

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.Class<?>> classesIn​(java.lang.String pckgname)
        Uses Java Reflection API to find all classes within the package named pckgname. Works well with .jar files.
        Parameters:
        pckgname - the name of the package.
        Returns:
        a list of Class objects.

      • simpleInstances

        public static <V extends Reflexive> java.util.List<V> simpleInstances​(java.lang.String pckgname,
                                                                      java.lang.Object... params)

        Finds simple instances of Reflexive subclasses within pckgname. A simple instance is either one that results from invoking a no-argument constructor or a getInstance() method.

        Type Parameters:
        V - a class implementing Reflexive
        Parameters:
        pckgname - the name of the package for the search
        Returns:
        a list of classes implementing Reflexive that are found in pckgname.

      • simpleInstances

        public static <V extends Reflexive> java.util.List<V> simpleInstances​(java.lang.String pckgname)
